summary: Financial assistance of Rs. 6000 per year to farmers in three installments.
eligibility_criteria: All small and marginal farmers with landholding up to 2 hectares.
application_process: Apply online on PM-KISAN portal or through Common Service Centers.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, land records, bank account details.

summary: Housing scheme to provide affordable houses to urban and rural poor.
eligibility_criteria: Economically Weaker Section (EWS) with annual income below Rs. 3 lakhs.
application_process: Apply through local municipal corporation or gram panchayat.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, income certificate, property documents.

summary: Health insurance scheme providing coverage up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year.
eligibility_criteria: All families not covered under any health insurance scheme.
application_process: Register at Ayushman Bharat centers or empaneled hospitals with Aadhaar.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, ration card, income certificate.

summary: Provides LPG connections to women from BPL households.
eligibility_criteria: Women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households without LPG connection.
application_process: Apply through local LPG distributor or online through Ujjwala portal.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, BPL certificate, bank account details.

summary: Savings scheme for the girl child, offering high interest rates and tax benefits.
eligibility_criteria: Parents of girl child below 10 years of age.
application_process: Open account at any authorized bank or post office with required documents.
documents_required: Birth certificate of girl child, Aadhaar cards of parents.

summary: Voluntary pension scheme to provide retirement income.
application_process: Apply online on NPS website or through banks and post offices.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, PAN card, bank account details.

summary: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers with guaranteed pension.
application_process: Apply through banks or post offices with required documents.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, bank account details, age proof.

summary: Provides loans up to Rs. 10 lakhs to non-corporate, non-farm small businesses.
eligibility_criteria: Small business owners, entrepreneurs, and startups.
application_process: Apply through participating banks with project proposal and KYC documents.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, PAN card, business plan, bank account details.

summary: Initiative to promote entrepreneurship and startups in India.
eligibility_criteria: Newly formed companies with innovative business models.
application_process: Register on Startup India portal and apply for recognition certificate.
documents_required: Company registration documents, business plan, ID proof.

summary: Poverty alleviation program focused on promoting self-employment.
eligibility_criteria: Rural poor, especially women Self-Help Groups (SHGs).
application_process: Join or form a Self-Help Group in your village and contact local NRLM coordinator.
documents_required: Aadhaar card, BPL certificate, bank account details.
